## Winter 2025

1. Nov 2025: Getting confident with Python and physical computing with Micro:bit
2. Nov 2025: Gentle introduction to command line and IDEs with Raspberry Pi 5 (vscode, package management, git)
3. Dec 2025: Tools for reproducible science (environments, git, dvc, data formats) and collaboration (quarto, github)
4. Jan 2025: Getting introduced to software design techniques (UML, BPMN, project/data management) and everyday machine learning (scikit)
5. Jan 2025 (optional): data, advanced topics
